text: :For the person practicing witchcraft, see witch W.I.T.C.H. is a German- American animated television series. It is based on the Italian comic book series of the same name, which was created by Gary Tomlin and Elisabetta Gnone. It is a fantasy anime series about a girl that can use magic. == References == Category:Television series by Disney Category:2004 American television series debuts Category:2006 American television series endings Category:American fantasy television series
title: W.I.T.C.H.
